April.title: GAME TIME: THE BINARY HOLDINGs x METANA HACKATHON
April.notes: Join the GAME TIME hackathon hosted by The Binary Holdings and Metana. Build hyper casual web-based games or consumer dApps that are easy for non-crypto users to engage with. Top 10 winners will share $3,000 USDT and gain exposure to 169 million users in Indonesia and the Philippines. Open to all experience levels. Final projects must be HTML5-based and hosted on platforms like Vercel or Heroku. 33% ownership of the submitted dApp goes to The Binary Holdings. Co-marketing, technical, and industry support included for winners. Let your creativity shine!
